definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Then lengthen your tailbone and sacrum as your thighbones descend toward your hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 然後，拉伸你的尾骨和骶骨，大腿骨沉向腿筋。

sentences.english: Now lean back against the firmness of the tail bone and shoulder blades.
sentences.chinese: 在保持尾骨和肩胛骨穩定的前提下，向後屈身。

sentences.english: Image studies demonstrated a cystic lesion of the coccyx.
sentences.chinese: 影像資料研究顯示尾骨區有一囊性佔位。

sentences.english: It enters the coccyx mainly through the ventral surface.
sentences.chinese: 尾骨血液供應較差，營養動脈主要由腹側面進入。

sentences.english: Well, the spine is made of twenty-nine vertebrae and the tailbone.
sentences.chinese: 因爲脊椎由29塊椎骨和一塊尾骨組成。

sentences.english: Bend your knees, drop your tailbone down.
Imagine that the sacrum is sinking deeper into the back of your pelvis and bring the tailbone closer to the pubis.
sentences.chinese: 想像骶骨下沉進入骨盆的後側並帶着尾骨靠近恥骨。

sentences.english: The coccyx is the remnant of what was once a human tail.
sentences.chinese: 尾骨是人類尾巴的遺留物。

sentences.english: Press your tailbone toward your pubis and turn the upper thighs inward slightly.
sentences.chinese: 尾骨壓向恥骨，大腿上部內側輕輕內旋。

sentences.english: Tuck your tailbone underneath just as in Tadasana.
sentences.chinese: 尾骨塞進就像是在山式。

sentences.english: Flex low back so coccyx moves up toward ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 彎曲下背部使尾骨移向天花板。

sentences.english: Tail Long with bone reaching at least to hock joint.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴長，尾骨延伸至飛節或以下。

sentences.english: Lengthen your tailbone away from the back of your pelvis and press it lightly toward the pubis.
sentences.chinese: 從骨盆的後部拉長尾骨，並輕輕地把它壓向恥骨。

sentences.english: Lengthen your tailbone toward the floor to keep the lower back long.
sentences.chinese: 伸展尾骨向地板方向並保持下背部長。

sentences.english: Let us next focus on the root chakra, which sits at the tailbone.
sentences.chinese: 接下來讓我們聚焦在位於尾骨的根部脈輪。

sentences.english: Extend low back so coccyx moves downward toward mat.
sentences.chinese: 伸展下背部使尾骨向下靠近墊子。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
sacrum (bone at the base of the spine)
